description: Scale ca. 1:201,000. Folded title: Visitors guide, Exercise Long Horn. Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. "3-52-4M." Covers Fort Hood region, Tex. Text, map of "General area, maneuver director headquarters, Exercise Long Horn, Fort Hood, Texas, March-April 1952," and col. illus. of military insignia on verso. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image.
